in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.service

Interface AuthenticationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationServiceImpl

    public interface AuthenticationService

    Service class to perform below user services :

    • Authenticate User
    • De-authenticate User
    • Authenticate Token
    • Find User from authentication-token
    • Find User-token from authentication-token
    • Manage Authentication-tokens
    Author:
    bismoy

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateUser

        DisplaySingleResult authenticateUser(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password)

        Authenticate User

        Displays status of user authentication by calling authenticateUser method from AuthenticationServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        username - user's email address
        password - user's given password

      • deAuthenticateUser

        DisplaySingleResult deAuthenticateUser(java.lang.String authenticationToken)

        De-authenticate User

        Displays status of user-deauthentication by calling deAuthenticateUser method from AuthenticationServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token generated as user logs in

      • authenticateToken

        boolean authenticateToken(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                        java.lang.String authenticationToken)

        Authenticate Token

        Displays status of authentication token by calling authenticateToken method from AuthenticationServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - user's given email id
        authenticationToken - user's token for authentication purpose

      • findUserFromAuthenticationToken

        User findUserFromAuthenticationToken(java.lang.String authenticationToken)

        Find User from authentication-token

        Displays status of user after being searched by it's authentication token

        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - user's token for authentication purpose

      • findUserTokenFromAuthneticationToken

        UserToken findUserTokenFromAuthneticationToken(java.lang.String authenticationToken)

        Find UserToken From AuthneticationToken

        Displays status of user token by calling findUserTokenFromAuthneticationToken method from AuthenticationServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - user's authentication token

      • manageAuthenticationTokens

        java.lang.String manageAuthenticationTokens(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                          java.lang.String tokenType)

        Manage Authentication Tokens

        Displays status of user's authentication token management by calling manageAuthenticationTokens from AuthenticationServiceImpl class

        Parameters:
        emailAddress - user's email id
        tokenType - type of user's token
